title: kAlanai udaittavanE
sahitya:
kAlanai udaittavanE kAmanai neTrik-kaNNinAl erittavanE haranE


anupallavi

  mUla kuNDali shakti bAlai sahasrArattil mukkanal ezhundiDa muyangum shakti shivanE


caraNam    kanavilum nanavilum enaip-piDittu varuttum kavalaiyai udaitterivAi
mana mAyaiyAghiya matiyiliyait-tavak-kanalinAl erittiDuvAi punita munivarkk-
anru pughanra shiva jnAna bOdhattai enakkaruLvAi inidu shir-shaktiyAl 
kanindu kanindunnuDan irandarak-kalandiDum varam tanai vENDinEn
